meanings.definition: One who makes something neater or tidier.
meanings.sent1: The sprucer organized his desk with precision.
meanings.sent2: The sprucer always keeps the garden looking tidy.
meanings.sent3: The sprucer rearranged the books on the shelf in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent4: She was a sprucer, bringing order to the chaotic room.
meanings.sent5: The sprucer's touch transformed the messy room into a neat space.

meanings.definition: To make oneself neater or tidier in appearance.
meanings.sent1: He decided to sprucer up before the important meeting.
meanings.sent2: She sprucered herself up before going out on a date.
meanings.sent3: The cat sprucered itself up by grooming its fur meticulously.
meanings.sent4: After a long day at work, she sprucered up before heading out for dinner.
meanings.sent5: The actor sprucered up for the red carpet event, looking sharp and elegant.
